dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes the Tours coat of arms and the Royal coats-of-arms of France and Navarre in upper right corner of map. Title cartouche includes grape vines and the date 1620. From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map 36 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner, Composite Atlas of France.,Hondius, Jodocus, 1594 or 1595-1629, cartographer.
